name: Mighty Morphin Cactus: In The Dark
name_original: Mighty Morphin Cactus: In The Dark
description:
As a Cactus in a strange cavern, your goal is to find your way out as quick as possible. You have the ability to shapeshift in 3 ways, use them to help you in your journey.

The time is running out Go, go, go!

Gamepad Recommended

Keyboard keys :

Space = Jump
J = Change to small size
K = Change to normal size
L = Change to big size
Enter = Launch game, Retry
Esc = Quit the game

Movement are on ZQSD, if you want WASD change the input in the unity launcher tab.


Some collectibles are hidden in the maze (3). Since they are not mandatory if you find them you'll gain extra time and more points.

This is my game for Ludum Dare 35 / Compo. Only one level at the moment, first time with Unity. Stay tuned for more and thanks for playing.

Made with Unity 5
Illustrator for Texture and other graphics
Chiptone / Audiotool / Audacity for the Sounds
